title: James Grieshaber
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : James Grieshaber**

**James Grieshaber** attended [Rochester Institute of Technology](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/RIT) and earned a BFA in [Graphic Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Graphic_Design). Grieshaber was a staff designer at [P22 Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P22) and helped establish [International House of Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/IHOF). He has been honored with awards of Excellence in Type Design from [Association Typographique International (ATypI)](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ATypI) for [Gothic Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gothic_Gothic) and from [TypeArt'05](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TypeArt%2705) for his [Operina](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Operina) Cyrillic type designs. He has been involved with the [Society of Typographic Aficionados](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/SOTA) and served as Chairman of [SOTA](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typesociety.org/about/) from 2008—2010. Designer and Co-editor of the [Indie Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indie%20Fonts) book series, Grieshaber has taught typography at RIT and now runs [Typeco](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typeco), his own type design studio, in Chicago, IL.

Type designs by James Grieshaber include: [Cezanne Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/cezanne-pro.html), [Operina Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/operina-pro.html), [Segoe Print](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/segoe-print--script.html), [Reenie Beanie](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/reenie-beanie.html), [Black Ops](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.google.com/webfonts/specimen/Black+Ops+One), [Short Stack](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.google.com/webfonts/specimen/Short+Stack), [Atomic Age](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.google.com/webfonts/specimen/Atomic+Age), [Supermercado](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.google.com/webfonts/specimen/Supermercado+One), [Metamorphous](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.google.com/webfonts/specimen/Metamorphous), [Sarina](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.google.com/webfonts/specimen/Sarina), [Posada](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/posada.html), [Woodtype](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.p22.com/products/woodtypeset.html), [Art Deco Chic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.p22.com/products/artdeco.html), [Arts & Crafts Hunter](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.p22.com/products/dard.html), [Arts & Crafts Tall](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.p22.com/products/dard.html), [Glyphic Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/glyphic-neue.html), [Chunkfeeder](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/chunkfeeder.html), [Trapper](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/trapper.html), [Super Duty](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/super-duty.html), [Cypher](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/cypher.html), [Gothic Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/gothic-gothic.html), [Cusp](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/cusp.html), [Numismatic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/numismatic.html), [Yule](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/yule.html), and [Zaftig](http://web.archive.org/web/20130919054937/http:/www.typeco.com/zaftig.html).
author: James Grieshaber
